attributes.action: To publish the rules and standards of parliament and to enact a law that the breaking of such becomes a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being in Parliament is a priviliged position. In any occupation the breaking of Company rules, abuse of ones position, fiddling expenses etc. are considered and result in immediate dismissal or a crime and dealt with accordingly by law. Why should Parliament be any different. An independant body to define the rules and standards and be accountable to the public for its policing.
